Html:
Hi,

 

I have created a small app, which would read users input and create an Excel File.  I have set the following parameters

  1. Row Heading should be with Green Color Background
  2. Print Settings should be papersize_legal

When I export the file and open in windows the exported file is exported correctly with

             Green Color row background and papersize is legal

But in Mac, it is exported as

            Gray Color row background and papersize is US Letter

Could any one help me in solving this, I would like to have my exported file to export as same in both windows and mac

 

regards,

Tim
